summary: Mod that turns Lydia into a mage for those who like the magical side of Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FFA500][b][u]*Requirements*[/color][/b][/u]
*Skyrim
*Latest Skyrim Update 1.8

[color=#FFA500][b][u]*Installation*[/color][/b][/u]
Place inside your Skyrim/Data and make sure it is enabled in your Skyrim Launcher data files.
Or use NMM.

[color=#FFA500][b][u]*Bugs*[/color][/b][/u]
She might use her default weaponry or use weapons based on the one you are using.

She might wander around trying to get to Dragonsreach , in this case add her to your current location by using Console Commands like so player.placeatme A2C8E 1.

She might give you basic dialogues when in other buildings if you have not added her a follower.

[color=#FFA500][b][u]*Future Plans*[/color][/b][/u]
Aim to add more dialogues, more variants, custom clothes, custom spells, and even add her own house.

My first real mod ever please support and give tips!
author: photos
